feed.title: Tall Guy Rob
feed.subtitle: \noun\ A developer of things, usually software.

entry.title: Cheating at Railway Oriented Programming in Elixir
entry.summary:
Over the past four months I’ve been writing Elixir full-time for backend systems. From this I’ll be releasing a series of small blog posts about techniques we utilise, and the advantages and disadvantages that we’ve found whilst using them.
The first

entry.title: Starting afresh with Middleman
entry.summary: For the (3rd, 4th?) time I’ve decided to re-launch my blog. I thought I’d start with a brief post on some of the minor technical details of my experience in switching to use Middleman and Middleman-Blog. I’ve used both Jekyll and Octopress in the past
